backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing user profiles, subscriptions, proposal generation logic, and access control with premium/free limits.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing summaries for all frontend source files used in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme design tokens using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root mount element and loading the React main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, theming, authentication layout, and page structure using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/account/PlanCard: Subscription plan card showing current plan, usage stats, premium features, and upgrade action.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Auth guard that redirects unauthenticated users, handles initialization state, and clears cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a modal prompting new authenticated users to enter their name and saves the profile via mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/UserMenu.ts: Displays a user dropdown with principal info and allows clearing identity and cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/SavedP: Fetches and displays saved proposals with view and delete actions, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/generate/Editabl: Provides an editable text section with edit, save, and copy actions for proposal content.
frontend/src/components/generate/Generat: Renders editable proposal output sections and propagates edits upward via callbacks.
Collects proposal input fields, checks generation entitlements, and triggers proposal generation with deterministic outputs.
frontend/src/components/generate/QuotaBa: Shows generation quota or premium status and prompts upgrade when free generations are low or exhausted.
frontend/src/components/generate/SavePro: Saves a proposal using a mutation and shows loading and success/error toasts.
Provides the main app layout with header navigation, user menu, content area, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, recreating it when identity changes and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and exposing identity state and helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, entitlements, proposal generation, saving, retrieval, and deletion using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes and global base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Renders the account and billing page with a profile setup modal and subscription plan card.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows saved proposals along with a profile setup modal.
frontend/src/pages/GeneratePage.tsx: Handles proposal generation workflow, form input, output editing, and saving proposals.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with marketing content and sign‑in flow redirecting authenticated users to generation.
frontend/src/pages/ProposalDetailPage.ts: Displays a single proposal with options to copy or delete it, handling loading and missing states.
frontend/src/utils/clipboard.ts: Provides async clipboard copy with a modern API and a textarea-based fallback for insecure contexts.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support and persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, features, requirements, and image assets for the ProposalPro AI SaaS app.
